data.text:
Elizabeta Mikhailovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia1

F, #105721, b. 26 May 1826, d. 28 January 1845

Last Edited=10 Nov 2010

Consanguinity Index=4.46%

Elizabeta Mikhaolovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia 2

Elizabeta Mikhailovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia was born on 26 May 1826 at St. Petersburg, Russia .1 She was the daughter of Mikhail Pavlovich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia and Helene Charlotte Prinzessin von Württemberg. She married Adolf Wilhelm von Nassau-Weilburg, Grand-Duc de Luxembourg, son of Georg Wilhelm August Heinrich Belgicus Herzog von Nassau-Weilburg and Luise Prinzessin von Sachsen-Altenburg, on 31 January 1844 at St. Petersburg, Russia . She died on 28 January 1845 at age 18 at Wiesbaden, Hessen, Germany .1

She gained the title of Grand Duchess Elizabeta Michailovna of Russia.1

Child of Elizabeta Mikhailovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia and Adolf Wilhelm von Nassau-Weilburg, Grand-Duc de Luxembourg

unnamed daughter von Nassau-Weilburg b. 27 Jan 1845, d. 27 Jan 1845

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 106. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

Wilhelmine Luisa Prinzessin von Hessen-Darmstadt1

F, #105723, b. 25 June 1755, d. 26 April 1776

Last Edited=13 May 2012

Consanguinity Index=0.06%

Nataliya Alekseievna, Tsarina of Russia

by Alexander Roslin, 1776 2

Wilhelmine Luisa Prinzessin von Hessen-Darmstadt was born on 25 June 1755 at Prenzlau, Brandenburg, Germany .1 She was the daughter of Ludwig IX Landgraf von Hessen-Darmstadt and Karoline Henriette Christina Louisa Pfalzgräfin von Zweibrücken-Birkenfeld.1 She married Pavel I Petrovich Romanov, Tsar of Russia, son of Petr III Romanov, Tsar of Russia and Catherine II Sofie Auguste von Anhalt-Zerbst, Tsarina of Russia, on 10 October 1773. She died on 26 April 1776 at age 20 at St. Petersburg, Russia .1

From 10 October 1773, her married name became Nataliya Alekseievna Romanov.1

Child of Wilhelmine Luisa Prinzessin von Hessen-Darmstadt and Pavel I Petrovich Romanov, Tsar of Russia

unnamed child Romanov b. 26 Apr 1776, d. 26 Apr 1776

Elena Pavlovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia1

F, #105725, b. 24 December 1784, d. 24 September 1803

Last Edited=16 Feb 2011

Consanguinity Index=0.9%

Elena Pavlovna and Aleksandra Pavlovna Romanov (l-r)

by Elisabeth Vignee Lebrun 2

Elena Pavlovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia was born on 24 December 1784 at St. Petersburg, Russia .3 She was the daughter of Pavel I Petrovich Romanov, Tsar of Russia and Sophia Dorothea Prinzessin von Württemberg. She married Friedrich Ludwig Erbgroßherzog von Mecklenburg-Schwerin, son of Friedrich Franz I Großherzog von Mecklenburg-Schwerin and Luise Prinzessin von Sachsen-Gotha-Roda, on 23 October 1799 at Gatchina, Russia .3 She died on 24 September 1803 at age 18.3

She gained the title of Grand Duchess Elena Pavlovna of Russia.1

Children of Elena Pavlovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia and Friedrich Ludwig Erbgroßherzog von Mecklenburg-Schwerin

Paul Friedrich Großherzog von Mecklenburg-Schwerin+3 b. 15 Sep 1800, d. 7 Mar 1842

Marie Luise Friederike Herzogin von Mecklenburg-Schwerin+4 b. 31 Mar 1803, d. 26 Oct 1862

Mariya Pavlovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia1

F, #105726, b. 16 February 1786, d. 23 June 1859

Last Edited=27 Nov 2010

Consanguinity Index=0.9%

Mariya Pavlovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia

by Bernard Edler von Guerard, 1804 2

Mariya Pavlovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia was born on 16 February 1786 at St. Petersburg, Russia .3 She was the daughter of Pavel I Petrovich Romanov, Tsar of Russia and Sophia Dorothea Prinzessin von Württemberg. She married Karl Friedrich Großherzog von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach, son of Karl August Großherzog von Sachsen-Weimar-Eisenach and Luise Auguste Prinzessin von Hessen-Darmstadt, on 3 August 1804 at St. Petersburg, Russia .3 She died on 23 June 1859 at age 73 at Belvedere, Weimar, Germany .3

She gained the title of Grand Duchess Mariya Pavlovna of Russia.1

Ekaterina Pavlovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia1

F, #105727, b. 21 May 1788, d. 19 January 1819

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=0.9%

Ekaterina Pavlovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia was born on 21 May 1788 at St. Petersburg, Russia .2 She was the daughter of Pavel I Petrovich Romanov, Tsar of Russia and Sophia Dorothea Prinzessin von Württemberg. She married, secondly, Wilhelm I König von Württemberg, son of Friedrich II (I) Wilhelm Karl König von Württemberg and Auguste Caroline Friederike Luise Prinzessin von Braunschweig-Wolfenbüttel, on 24 January 1816 at St. Petersburg, Russia .3 She married, firstly, Georg Peter Friedrich von Holstein-Gottorp, Herzog von Oldenburg, son of Peter I Friedrich Ludwig von Holstein-Gottorp, Grand Duke of Oldenburg and Friederike Herzogin von Württemberg, on 3 August 1809 at Peterhof Palace, St. Petersburg, Russia .4 She died on 19 January 1819 [9 Jan 1819 O.S.] at age 30 at Stuttgart, Baden-Württemburg, Germany.2

She gained the title of Grand Duchess Ekaterina Pavlovna of Russia.1

Children of Ekaterina Pavlovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia and Georg Peter Friedrich von Holstein-Gottorp, Herzog von Oldenburg

Alexander von Holstein-Gottorp, Herzog von Oldenburg b. 30 Aug 1810, d. 16 Nov 1829

Constantine Friedrich Peter von Holstein-Gottorp, Herzog von Oldenburg+ b. 26 Aug 1812, d. 14 May 1881

Olga Pavlovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia1

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=0.9%

Olga Pavlovna Romanov, Grand Duchess of Russia was born on 22 July 1792 at St. Petersburg, Russia .1 She was the daughter of Pavel I Petrovich Romanov, Tsar of Russia and Sophia Dorothea Prinzessin von Württemberg. She died on 26 January 1795 at age 2 at St. Petersburg, Russia .1

She gained the title of Grand Duchess Olga Pavlovna of Russia.1

Citations

Mikhail Pavlovich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia1

M, #105729, b. 8 February 1798, d. 9 September 1849

Last Edited=9 Feb 2010

Consanguinity Index=0.9%

Mikhail Pavlovich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia

by George Dawe 2

Mikhail Pavlovich Romanov, Grand Duke of Russia was born on 8 February 1798 at St. Petersburg, Russia .3 He was the son of Pavel I Petrovich Romanov, Tsar of Russia and Sophia Dorothea Prinzessin von Württemberg. He married Helene Charlotte Prinzessin von Württemberg, daughter of Paul Heinrich Karl Friedrich August Prinz von Württemberg and Katherine Charlotte Georgine Prinzessin von Sachsen-Hildburghausen, on 20 February 1824.3 He died on 9 September 1849 at age 51 at Warsaw, Poland .3

He gained the title of Grand Duke Mikhail Pavlovich of Russia.
